subsections.description: Designed and implemented AltWalker: an open source Model-Based Testing framework that supports running tests written in python3 and .NET/C#.
Efficiently deployed and integrated multiple CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD and GitHub CI/CD) to improve the development process.
Helped to organize and supervise an online workshop on Model-Based Testing, helping the participants to go through the practical exercises.
Build RESFul APIs (using Flask) that serves data to our front-end application that enabled out team to visualize test reports.
